name: Maraiyum: Rise of the Setting Sun
description: The coup has finally come! After the disastrous rule of the previous Emperor, the Imperial army have placed you, a distant relative with no training, on the throne. With rebellions, religious insurgency, widespread famine, and a rapidly dwindling treasury, time is not on your side.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and above Processor: 2.33GHz or faster x86-compatible processor, or Intel Atomâ„¢ 1.6GHz or faster processor for netbook class devices Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 200 MB available space
